heroHeadline: LAMAR HOUSE - Beachfront Living in Playa de los Higuericlas
heroIntro:
LAMAR HOUSE brings contemporary coastal properties to one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after beach destinations. With 2 available homes in their Higuericlas Beach development, this developer focuses on delivering quality beachfront and near-beach residences in Playa de los Higuericlas. Our current portfolio showcases their commitment to modern design and prime location selection.

Looking for a property with direct beach access or stunning coastal views? LAMAR HOUSE developments offer the lifestyle you're seeking on the Costa Blanca. We work directly with this developer to bring you their latest releases and exclusive inventory in this desirable area.

aboutSection.title: About LAMAR HOUSE
aboutSection.content:
LAMAR HOUSE specializes in developing residential properties that capitalize on Costa Blanca's most attractive coastal locations. Their approach combines accessible pricing with quality construction, targeting buyers seeking authentic beach community living.

With focused development in established beach destinations like Playa de los Higuericlas, LAMAR HOUSE understands the market demands and delivers properties that meet both practical and lifestyle needs. Their Higuericlas Beach project demonstrates their commitment to the southern Costa Blanca market.

specializationSection.title: Coastal Development Focus
specializationSection.content:
LAMAR HOUSE concentrates their development efforts on Costa Blanca's southern coastal zone, with particular expertise in Playa de los Higuericlas. This beach area offers a perfect balance between established infrastructure and relaxed Mediterranean living, making it ideal for both permanent residents and holiday home buyers.

Their Higuericlas Beach development showcases how quality residential projects can enhance established communities while respecting local character. Properties in this zone typically feature proximity to beaches, local amenities, and easy access to larger Costa Blanca towns.

qualitySection.title: Quality & Specifications
features: Modern construction standards and building techniques
Open-plan living spaces with natural light
Proximity to beach and local services
qualitySection.content: LAMAR HOUSE maintains consistent quality standards across their developments. Each property receives attention to detail in both construction quality and material selection, ensuring durability and buyer satisfaction. Their focus on modern specifications means properties are built for contemporary coastal living, with proper attention to local climate conditions and lifestyle requirements.

faqs.question: Where exactly are LAMAR HOUSE properties located?
faqs.answer: LAMAR HOUSE develops properties in Playa de los Higuericlas, a beach destination on Costa Blanca South. Their Higuericlas Beach project is their current major development in this area.

faqs.question: How many properties does LAMAR HOUSE currently have available?
faqs.answer: We currently have 2 properties available from LAMAR HOUSE. These represent their active listings in the Playa de los Higuericlas area.

faqs.question: What types of properties does LAMAR HOUSE build?
faqs.answer: LAMAR HOUSE develops a range of residential property types including villas, apartments, and townhouses, all designed for the coastal market with modern specifications.

conclusion: LAMAR HOUSE offers genuine beach-oriented properties in one of Costa Blanca's most appealing coastal destinations. Browse our current listings to see what's available in their Playa de los Higuericlas developments, or contact our team for more information about this developer's upcoming projects.
